name: World Wildlife Fund (WWF)
description: Works to conserve nature and address environmental challenges globally.

name: The Nature Conservancy
description: Protects lands and waters, fosters conservation, and addresses climate change.

name: National Audubon Society
description: Dedicated to the protection of birds and their habitats across the Americas.

name: Rainforest Foundation
description: Supports indigenous communities in protecting rainforests and their rights.

name: Wildlife Conservation Society
description: Saves wildlife and wild places through science, conservation, and education.

name: The Sierra Club
description: Promotes environmental protection and responsible use of natural resources.

name: Earthjustice
description: Uses legal action to protect the environment and public health.

name: National Wildlife Federation
description: Works to protect wildlife and habitats and connect people with nature.

name: Conservation International
description: Empowers societies to responsibly and sustainably care for nature.

name: The Jane Goodall Institute
description: Promotes wildlife conservation, research, and community development.

name: Defenders of Wildlife
description: Protects native animals and their habitats in North America.

name: Center for Biological Diversity
description: Advocates for the protection of endangered species and wild places.

name: American Rivers
description: Works to protect and restore rivers and clean water in the United States.

name: The Ocean Conservancy
description: Addresses ocean conservation and sustainable fisheries globally.

name: Bat Conservation International
description: Dedicated to the conservation of bats and their ecosystems worldwide.

name: National Park Foundation
description: Supports America's national parks through philanthropy and advocacy.

name: The Wildlife Trusts
description: Works to protect and restore wildlife and habitats across the United Kingdom.

name: World Resources Institute (WRI)
description: Addresses environmental and sustainability challenges through research and analysis.

name: Polar Bears International
description: Focuses on polar bear conservation and the Arctic ecosystem.

name: Rainforest Trust
description: Conserves tropical rainforests and endangered wildlife.
